name: Telegram VC Player Bot
description: Telegram Voice-Chat Music Player Bot. Dveloped and maintained by Mr. Nitric.

API_ID.description: API ID of your Telegram Account. Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: API HASH of your Telegram Account. Get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: BOT TOKEN for the music bot. Get this from @BotFather.

USERBOT_SESSION.description: USER BOT Session string. generate this using the generateSession.py script present in github repo.

MONGO_URL.description: MONGO Database URI. Leave it blank as it's not compulsory.

MODE.description: Default is multiple, which means bot will be allowed only in one group. Allowed [single, multiple]

AUTO_LEAVE.description: False by default. Allows the user bot to leave the grp at regualr intervals automatically. Allowed [on, off]
